section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the Judgment and opinion for Court to announce in 75-246, United States against Hopkins and for reasons stated in an opinion for the Court filed with a clerk this morning, the Judgment of the United States Court of Claims is affirmed in part and vacated and remanded in part.
On remand further proceedings consisting with the Court's opinion are to be conducted by the Court of Claims.
Mr. Justice Powell filed a dissenting statement in the case.
